metadata.title: CVE-2020-25635 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Ansible Base when using the aws_ssm connection pluginas garbage collector is not happening after playbook run is completed.Files would remain in the bucket exposing the data. This issue affectsdirectly data confidentiality.

criterions.comment: ansible package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
